entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
